titleInfo.title: Bob Wills and his Texas Playboys - Tiffany Transcriptions - 1947-12-30 - 'J'

mods.abstract: Bob Wills And His Texas Playboys recording for the Tiffany Music Company. 1947-12-30 session, recorded at The Sound Recorders, 421 Powell St, San Francisco, California.
